      • addTest

        protected final void addTest(int mustPassCount,
           int tryHarderCount,
           int maxMisreads,
           int maxTryHarderMisreads,
           float rotation)
        Adds a new test for the current directory of images.
        Parameters:
        mustPassCount - The number of images which must decode for the test to pass.
        tryHarderCount - The number of images which must pass using the try harder flag.
        maxMisreads - Maximum number of images which can fail due to successfully reading the wrong contents
        maxTryHarderMisreads - Maximum number of images which can fail due to successfully reading the wrong contents using the try harder flag
        rotation - The rotation in degrees clockwise to use for this test.
